actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to further amend the Federal Civil Defense Act of 1950, as amended, to require national standard fire hose screw threads on couplings of fire hoses and other equipment used for fire protective purposes.

summary.text: Requires, under the Federal Civil Defense Act, national standard fire hose screw threads on couplings of fire hoses and other equipment used for fire protective purposes.

titles.title: A bill to further amend the Federal Civil Defense Act of 1950, as amended, to require national standard fire hose screw threads on couplings of fire hoses and other equipment used for fire protective purposes.
